title: [1.7.10][SpicyStreak5's HALO content pack——光环拓展包]在MC玩HALO[DC搬运组]
author: AppleDeath
txt_content:
本帖最后由 AppleDeath 于 2016-10-12 20:56 编辑 

大家好，我又来了，自从投身搬运业后我就一刻也没有停止在外网搜刮的行动，今天给大家带来的是一款Flans Mod的附属拓展包：光晕拓展包！光晕HALO大家一定是没吃过猪肉也见过猪跑，原bungie工作室产品，现微软旗下的当红FPS游戏，没错，就是那个HALO，在MC玩家的努力下，成功的把它做成了flans mod的附属，加入到了Minecraft的游戏里了！


这个mod还原了HALO的大部分的武器装备以及载具，甚至对各个版本的相同武器的略微差别都做了出来，唯一遗憾的就是星盟方面的装备略有欠缺，不过作者一直在更新，相信之后一定会做出更完美的作品。


安装方法：下载后将压缩包拖入游戏.minecraft文件夹的 flan文件夹中（请确保已安装flans mod，并运行过一次游戏，不然不会有flan文件夹）

汉化相关：还在汉化进程中，进度略缓慢，不过一定会出来的


作者的更新日志：
Version 1.0, Initial Release  --
Version 1.1, Added SAW, SMG Pump and Energy Bayonet.  --
Version 1.2, Gave weapons correct attachment slots, added S.A.W. Ammo, added Magnum, and added Master Chief Helmet  --Version 1.3, Added Shotgun and Assault Rifle paint jobs.  --
Version 1.4, Fixed battle rifle model not showing up, added classic battle rifle and halo 3 shotgun, and made sniper rifle zoom in more to compensate for only 1 zoom level per gun/scope  --
Version 1.5,Cars! Tanks! Teams Support! Added Warthog and Scorpion, UNSC tank shells, SPNKR Rocket Launcher And better teams support. rocket ammo, and better teams support. Also accidentally deleted a bad assault rifle skin, so I replaced it with a new and better one.  --
Version 1.6, Added Drop Pod, SMG Silencer, And ODST Magnum. Also made the warthog not indestructible anymore.  --
Version 1.7, Added Sabre, Nornfang, Plasma Pistol, Plasma Rifle, Brute Plasma Rifle, Sniper Rifle Skins, Recon Sight, Stabilization Jets, Kinetic Bolts, Laser Targeter, Spartan Armour, Spartan Legs, Spartan Boots, Red and Blue Versions of Spartan Armour Spartan Legs and Spartan Boots, Longsword, Guass Warthog, Scout Warthog, Troop Warthog, UNSC Bombs, Plasma Pack, Unknown Alien Sniper Rifle, and Remade every singlle icon in the entire thing.  --
Version 1.8, Added Halo Reach DMR and Assault Rifle, ODST SMG, Yellow, Black, and Pink armour sets, Custom Ion SMG, Energy Dagger, Wraith, Grizzly, Grizzly Shells and Canister Shells--.
